models.name: IndiRegBias-A-Benchmark-Dataset-for-Regional-Bias-Detection-in-Indian-Language-Models
models.description: This research assesses the effectiveness of Large Language Models (LLMs) in identifying regional bias within Indian social media comments. In a diverse country like India, these biases perpetuate stereotypes and foster social division, presenting a unique challenge for current LLMs that are primarily trained on Western datasets.

models.name: Fake-News-Detection
models.description: TruthGuard: AI-Powered Fake News Detection  A machine learning system designed to automatically classify news articles as real or fake using Natural Language Processing (NLP). The project features a dual-model approach and an interactive web application for easy demonstration and use.

models.name: Space-Transformers-2026
models.description: This code takes the example given in the paper "SpaceTransformers: Language Modeling for Space Systems"  https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/stamp/stamp.jsp?arnumber=9548078  and starts with the source code and domain-specific models are available at github.com/strath-ace/smart-nlp and adds the ability to evaluative models and provides new features.

models.name: fake_news_detection_model
models.description: Fake News Detection Model (Machine Learning + NLP)  This project uses Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Logistic Regression to detect whether a news article is FAKE or TRUE. The model is trained using TF-IDF vectorization and learns patterns from real and fake news datasets.

models.name: fake-news-detection
models.description: This project is a Fake News Detection System built using Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (NLP). The system analyzes the text of a news article and predicts whether it is Real or Fake using a trained ML model.  The main objective of this project is to help users quickly identify misleading information by leveraging AI techniques.

models.name: AI-Fake-News-Detection-system
models.description: This repository contains an AI-powered Fake News Detection System built using Python, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Machine Learning. The model classifies news articles as Real or Fake based on textual patterns.
